summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the ROMS tools setup package, exercising components such as boundary forcing, dataset handling, lateral fill, grid creation and manipulation, initial conditions, nesting logic, river and surface forcing, tidal forcing, topography processing, utility helpers, and result validation. The tests verify data integrity, configuration handling, file I/O, plotting, serialization, and compatibility across various geographic scenarios.
business_intent: Provide automated quality assurance for the ROMS tools setup utilities, ensuring reliable preparation of ocean model inputs and configurations before production runs.
